website_summaries.verdict: Professional grade face paints in a kit with bright pigment and 4 glitter choices.
pros: Doesn't require a lot of water
A little goes a long way
cons: Some of the colors in this kit leave behind stains on the skin

customer_reviews.title: Bobuggles=bomb.com!! I definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I use Bobuggles ALL THE TIME!!! The quality of the paint is great. Water activated, so you can control how thick or thin you apply your paint to your skin. The colors are vibrant, and last quite awhile. I've done dozens of looks and still have quite a bit of my paint left. (I use black and white most often, so I'm getting low on those lol). 4 of the containers are loose glitters. I didn't realize that at first. I thought they were glitter paints, but they aren't. Beautiful glitters though!! I constantly recommend Bobuggles to all the beauty groups I'm in. I would buy this again in a heart beat!! 💖😍💋💋
customer_reviews.author: michelle.a.hewitt.2013

customer_reviews.title: The colour payoff is great awesome texture but the fact remains this paint stains
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this product more stars but sadly I cannot .The colour payoff is great awesome texture but the fact remains this paint stains . I normally swatch my paints on my hand before using them and when I tried washing certain colours off they left stains on my hand that took over a day with lots of scrubbing to get off. I’m sorry but I cannot recomendable these paints until that is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Seonaid Jervis

customer_reviews.title: ... bought face paint so I thought it was really nice, the package arrived on time the packaging itself ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever bought face paint so I thought it was really nice, the package arrived on time the packaging itself was secure and not over bulky (as I have to pay for additional weight and size) the product was well kept. the only thing is you have to apply a little bit of water (2-3 tear drops )to get the paint runny but once you add it 's really easy to manipulate especially with the brushes easy gliding, I have not tried it with the glitter but ill update once i try it.
customer_reviews.author: oadderley

customer_reviews.title: Stains skin
customer_reviews.text: The blue, pink and purple stain the skin. Also, there are several colors that don't want to dissolve in water to give a smooth full color application. It's hard to get a good consistency. I'm attaching a photo of a patristical decoration, and you can see where the red was patchy. I was trying to get a smooth texture and was getting really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Good Paint, Stains Skin
customer_reviews.text: This face paint is very nice to work with, the colors are very pretty and the pigment is nice. The only downside is the colors stain, like, the green will tint your skin for a couple days! Fortunately, most of the kids faces I paint I don't see again... but that still does not solve the problem. But again great paints and even the little brushes it came with were surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are true and vibrant. I've done over a dozen faces and it doesn't look as I've put a dent in it. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Assortment of Quality Paints
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a company picnic where we did face painting for kids. The assortment of colors is very good, and I liked the 4 sparkle paints which were included. The product goes very far - we have plenty left over for the next event. The kit also includes stencils which were helpful. They stick on and you paint inside the stencils. They are not reusable after about 10 paintings. The kit includes 2 brushes - definitely order a set of additional brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Joan B. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Just buy something worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these are the worst water based body paints! the colors aren’t vibrant and are hard to apply. It looks tacky and I was not impressed. The red is orange and the yellow is almost an off white color. Might try to use it on something else? Maybe watercolors? But definitely will not use on someone ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie420

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: Not the best coverage, had to frequently wet applicator. The white was not very opaque and needed re-apply. Making controlled lines wasn't great, but not horrible either. I guess you need to spend a lot more to get high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: CLD

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than it looks when multiple layers are applied
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the face paint and added the water, it was a little thin. If you apply multiple layers the color is bolder. Colors are mixable (I use the lids to mix the colors, they are easy to clean out). I like the containers the paints come in, it helps prevent the paint from cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis Coralee Leonhardi

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The product works as described if you use very little water and use a second coating. Wipes clean. The box it comes in has a magnetic closure flap which is convenient. The slots for the brushes are not good because the brushes keep falling through making it difficult to remove the brushes. My package did come damaged. The package was not mailed in a box. It was mailed in an envelope with bubble lining but as you can see in the pictures the item was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!. Never expected the vibrant colors and glitter. My daughter 11 yrs old got into face painting with cos play, first time i ordered this product but wont be the last... THANK YOU for making a great product. Highly recommend it. Even though its not a kid product, and most likely used proffessionally, i wanted my daughter to really have the feel of this quality. Totally impressed. Will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my kids birthday party and missed placed it. Now I have found it I use it for fun art and painting my kids and my face while streaming on twitch! It's easy to use and come off great, the only color that I've found that "stains" the skin is the dark pink/magenta color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great painting!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are awesome. Very easy to use when mixed to right consistency. The glitters are really fun. I was able to do some pretty awesome faces at a community event that lasted 12 hours. Love this paint
customer_reviews.author: Pam Sproul

customer_reviews.title: Stains the skin, hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: Lots of colors and easy application but it stains the skin and is very difficult to remove, especially blues and pinks. Make up remover, soap, and lotion are no match for these pigments. The web site says it will come off ‘eventually’ but for face paint- I’m not feeling that’s acceptable - especially on kids faces
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I just got my face paint kit 15 minutes ago. ❤️ I love it!!! Smooth, easy to use, vibrant colors, so joyful about this product. I waited all week and it was worth the wait. I have a community outreach of free kids face painting. I was nervous about how I would do. I have only face painted a couple times. This kit makes me feel like a pro🤩 I’m all tattooed up with face paint right now! A bouquet of balloons, a spiders &web, hearts, bees, and dragonflies, I’m feel like showing them off😎 Bo Buggles pro rocks😘 one more thing!!! I have very dark brown skin and this face paint pops!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Bruns-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Small jar went a long way
customer_reviews.text: The product was very pigmented after working with it and knowing how to apply it. I was able to use it for our Halloween make up and the colors are to true to what they look like in the plastic containers. However the only reason for not getting a full 5 stars was after about 3 to 4 hours it wears off or rubs off, but you can reapply if need to. Other then that it got the job done!
customer_reviews.author: latrisha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the quality to be so good. Just takes a little bit of water and then it goes on smooth! I created some fun Halloween looks and a little bit of paint goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Simmons

customer_reviews.title: All the pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter has had a lot of fun with these face paints. She has spent many, many hours face painting the neighborhood. The company was wonderful and receptive when I reached out to them for recommendations on more stencils, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint would be the little brushes. Other than that I absolutely love this stuff can’t wait to buy more. It’s easy to work with, dries beautifully and you can put makeup overtop of it no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for face painting at our school carnival. Very easy to use. Goes a long, long way. I have plenty left over for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Bella2three

customer_reviews.title: Stains your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dia de los muertos and this completely stained my face. It did not come off at all. I would recommend finding another product that does not stain as badly. Also, when I got the box it looked old and was retaped all over which made it look like it had been resold. Very disappointed but more so with the staining.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face paints!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product we ended up using it for Halloween. I bought it for an event at my college but it got delayed and arrived the day after. But the product itself is amazing. I had a fun time using it at a Halloween party.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Clouse

customer_reviews.title: The product is packaged nicely and would otherwise have been nice
customer_reviews.text: Many of the colors do not wash off. No luck with soap and water. Even make-up remover won't take it off. The product is packaged nicely and would otherwise have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Safe for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for face painting. Doesn't irritate skin. Dries fast. Safe for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: BrittGArtistry

customer_reviews.title: Great face paint
customer_reviews.text: Great face paint. Glitter is a free dry glitter so you have to mix it with th paint. I loved this set
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Holliday

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful kit!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 11 year old niece. She loved it! Great colors, brushes and stencils.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Hard to make even tones, dries skin
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not as bright as I expected, but when dessappointed me the most is that it’s almost impossible to make [let’s say white] even tone. It goes with lines and I couldn’t make in even even using a sponge. It also dries the skin :( Rome was very easily tho. That’s why I gave 2 starts instead of 1
customer_reviews.author: Maryia

customer_reviews.title: Beginner's Luck
customer_reviews.text: I just took a chance on the Bo Buggles paint and I am a convinced buyer. Colors were bright, paint was rich in texture and it dried quickly. The children and parents all loved the designs!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST YOU CAN BUY!!! WONDERFUL COLOR!!! THANK YOU SOO MUCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme dahl

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The glue holding the box wasnt holding so the box kind of came apart. I know the box is not the reason I bought the product but still feel it says something about the product and the brushes it comes with dont feel the best either.
customer_reviews.author: r0b0_amazonprime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect face paint kit for our church event
customer_reviews.text: Perfect face paint kit for our church event. The colors were vibrant and the glitter topped it off. I would highly recommend. The case makes is easy to organize and carry along to any event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, these are good quality with nice bright colors and although the paint tubs look small they last a long time. I have already painted over 100 faces and haven't even used half the supply. Nice sparkles too.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Color is easy to apply, STAYS ON & doesn't smear... and looks really great. Excellent face paint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glitter is loose and not a glitter paint
customer_reviews.text: Not clear that the glitters are loose and not a glitter paint. The paints are a great quality though and work well. Wish the pot lids screwed on the bottom of the jar when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Nice paints, good variety
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help paint faces for halloween and they were great. Easy to use, fun, and easy to wash off. Much better than other face paints I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Barnabas H.

customer_reviews.title: Ahmazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy application, stays well, cleans up super easy. I would definitely order again and probably will based on how much I use these already.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Rich color
customer_reviews.text: Love these face paints. They’ll be my go to brand for now on.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: As described and more. Thank you. Mind, I have only used it once so I am yet to have any complaints of any side effects.... Will update if any
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: ITS GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Its literally garbage, the red isn’t even red its red orange. It becomes goop after a few uses, do not buy it. This was a complete waste of money. I needed it in a pinch and the reviews seemed great but no its terrible
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: Do not use!
customer_reviews.text: If you want whatever is painted in to STAY on after you wipe it off, get this. but very few people like face tattoos. this pic is after i scrubbed!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: The look of this item is very professional looking and the colors are vibrant. This product is great for my daughter's sensitive skin & does not bother my other daughters who has eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Loved it..only thing i taught it was much bigger than it seems but was overall satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline pineda

customer_reviews.title: Decent paints and great value
customer_reviews.text: It really is a great value for the price. Some of the colors stain the skin a little bit but not terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face painting kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome face painting kit.....easily applies, doesn't smudge and washes off quickly....Bought for my daughter who loves face painting!!! Will definitely buy more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlana Burns

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different types of face paints and this is definitely the best product for the cost. The colors are bold and go on smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic.
customer_reviews.text: I like the products very much. Colors are bright and lots of pigment. I used on my granddaughter, and is for her birthday party in September.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is water activated
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer and all I can say is worth it. Is easy to use and you able to build up the shades, I appreciate how easy the clean up was too. Is a must have if you enjoy Halloween looks as much as me
customer_reviews.author: Mirella Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face paint
customer_reviews.text: Great face paint. Easy to use and stayed on a long time. I used makeup remover wipes and it came right off.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved theses she is starting face painting for her church
customer_reviews.author: Tristin Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High-quality face paint that doesn't stain the skin or cause an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Mme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the artistically challenged
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the artistically challenged. The stencils work great. More variety would be awesome but I was pleasently surprised
customer_reviews.author: Edris Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit for 4 weeks at a summer concert series painting kids faces. Still have a lot left. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Lare Williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended and super quality
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my daughters Halloween costume. They go on beautifully, no Cracking and wash off without staining the skin. Also, did not cause any sensitivity issues.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: So far not bad
customer_reviews.text: Found it a bit hard to with stencils I am continuing to practice hopefully it will improve
customer_reviews.author: Randy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Oof
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more to work with but i really like how easy it is to apply, no headaches and the paint stays on for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kiele Tohara

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is water activated
customer_reviews.text: I love this product was very easy to use. I used it for face painting.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaLynn Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: I think these are awesome. Easy to use, great colors, easy to remove. Excellent set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily washes off!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic kit! So easy to use and the colors are beautiful! It also easily washes off!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these face paints
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these face paints. Volunteered for painting all the kids faces at school and this stuff was awesome when I used them with a set of various brushes.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Face painting made eazy
customer_reviews.text: Used this to paint faces around halloween...Great product. Smooth application and will last for a while. Stencils take getting used to but work well.
customer_reviews.author: Tahlia

customer_reviews.title: Great face paint
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to work with! Best face paint we've used.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly murphy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it had been tossed around before going into the ...
customer_reviews.text: The box that the makeup is in and the outer box are very damaged. Looks like it had been tossed around before going into the Amazon box, other then that colors and pigment look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pleiman

customer_reviews.title: The product was just ok
customer_reviews.text: What liked about it was it was easy to clean off my face what disliked about the product had to put water in it cause it was to dry. It was easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: CHAD J  SYKES

customer_reviews.title: Glad it was still summer
customer_reviews.text: The paints stain the skin. Kids had face paint for a few days. Glad it was still summer. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really great quality face painting. My daughter loves it. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this kit. The colors were easy to use and to wipe off the children.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Face Paint
customer_reviews.text: Best face paint ever. All you need is water and you get a vibrant color.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!! Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It works amazingly ded worth the buy!!! Follow me on ig @GLAMONCAMWLEXX or facebook me at "Lex Glam" or "Glam on cam with Lex" 🖤🖤🖤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: Smaller palettes than I would have liked. Paint isn't as creamy and smooth as other brands I've used, but still completely acceptable. Love the tiny brushes and glitter!
customer_reviews.author: ALICE K SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!! They work just as described! And i love that they come with glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Salem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My daughter loves it and colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors but certain ones stain.
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors but certain ones stain. I put a base layer of white down to prevent as much staining as possible after the first go round lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Quick

customer_reviews.title: Stain skin
customer_reviews.text: Stained my son skin, now he have half face blue... don’t use it!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Pinto Ideias Martins

customer_reviews.title: I love Bo Buggles Pro paints
customer_reviews.text: I love Bo Buggles Pro paints. I’ve worked with several different paints but this one is my favorite. It mixes very well to create different colors and goes on the skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Good with a facial sponge
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to get color as bright as in pallet. Good with a facial sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stencils are not reusable as it should in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paint quality was better than I expected! Stencils are crap.
customer_reviews.author: Schandra

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: small paints but i love it would recommend fast dry no cracking colors very bright and easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. A little hard to get off but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A little hard to get off but it doesn't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: colin voigt

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! :)
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT buy! The paints and stencils are SUPER easy to use! And they looked great too! So great, that everyone at the party asked me where I found such an awesome kit :)
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Wood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! This face paint met my expectations, good quality, and lasts for a long time. Would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Medina

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged, easy to use. I'm very happy with these paints.
customer_reviews.author: marian crowley

customer_reviews.title: Good product, stains though.
customer_reviews.text: The black stained one little girl's shirt, even with bleach it didn't come out. The green and red stained another little girl's face, even with make up remover wipes and soap and water. They were great otherwise, dried quickly for active kids. It didn't run in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Dance Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic paints for a first time user!
customer_reviews.text: Never having used face paint before, this was a very easy product to use. The colors are bright and easy to apply. The company owner contacted me after the purchase to see if I had any questions. This follow up was a pleasant surprise. I will continue to support Bo Buggles face paint kits because of the great product and caring company owner.
customer_reviews.author: darlene capriotti

customer_reviews.title: Little go's a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend investing in this face painting kit by Buggles if you want to make facing a professional hobby of yours or need more then one use of it because this kit is for multiple uses & little go's a long way! So like I stated this is a great investment for the long run...The colors are vibrant & dried quickly, even the quality glitter is fabulous! I do suggest buying different brushes in the one given in this kit which is no biggie in my book! The only disclaimer that I have is the colors to stain a little bit, so you do have to be patient when washing it off but I'm still extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The kit is amazing, love the colors and the glitter
customer_reviews.text: The kit is amazing, love the colors and the glitter! The stencils are so easy to use my step-daughter loved the cherry one, the only thing I didn't like was that the red color is too pigmented and it took a few days to go away from her face after I drew a rainbow, maybe I didn't use enough water, I'm not sure, the poor thing spent 3 days with a red line across her forehead haha
customer_reviews.author: Roci

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the response because their was an assumption on their ...
customer_reviews.text: Got an email from the seller about the product and let him know I was returning it. I didn't like the response because their was an assumption on their part that I was a novice face painter. I hired a professional make up artist to do my face painting for a Halloween event and she didn't even like the product or its texture.. I didn't like how the paint felt on my face nor its consistency. I ended up washing it off and she ended up going home and brought the make up she uses by Wolfe FX.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t love it.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave bad reviews, but here it is. I’m new to face painting. I ordered a bunch of different paint, and my favorite is also the least expensive- Snazaroo. I ordered this because it had good reviews, and maybe with experience very I will like it more, but from a beginnier’s standpoint, this paint isn’t as smooth and is harder to work with. I will update my review as I get more practice and see if I change my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best face paints I have ever used ! Don't waste any more time looking for other products, this is the one you should buy, These are fantastic, they are beautiful colors vibrant, bright, and after using them for several hours, we didn't even make a dent in the amount of product in the jars, these will probably last many many years. The only negative thing I could say if I had to is that a few of the colors left some staining on the face, but we found that some coconut oil and a cotton ball seemed to take the majority off.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Fun set of colors to work with!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed working with this professional face painting kit! The colors are very bright and a little drop of water goes a long way! Don't over do it with a lot of water or it will look like watercolors. It is best with a drop of water to mix into a creamy consistency which helps you work better. The only reason I give 4 stars is because while using the stencils I noticed the solution would seap through the areas where the stencil covered the skin and it turned out looking smeared. Other than that I did most if it by free hand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: We loved decorating our faces with it—young and old alike
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality face paint. We loved decorating our faces with it—young and old alike. I’d say it’s difficult to remove from skin (we had to use Vaseline and baby wipes but that worked well), however I didn’t get any on clothing so I’m not sure how well it comes out. My daughter left it on 3 days and it didn’t come off on the sheets though! Well worth the money. I’ve decorated 5 entire faces with it and barely used any.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it... I'm new to face painting and this paint was so smooth n easy to clean...now I love face painting. Just in case if someone new like me wants to know which brushes to buy...here I bought bianyo nylon 14 brushes set which comes in a cute brush case..hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sujith S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and professional
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these paints. Super professional and we get a ton of compliments. If you wear them all day some of the darker colors stain a bit, but with a good exfoliating soap it fades away fairly quickly. Have not had a problem with my skin but haven’t worn it more than one day at a time.
customer_reviews.author: PBR

customer_reviews.title: Great for a newbie!
customer_reviews.text: Love these paints! This is my 1st time face painting, so I really have nothing to compare it to, but imo these paints are everything I need. The stencils are great for a quick application, and the brushes are sufficient for freehanding, which also worked great. If I were to have one complaint it would be the paint brushes handles are a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Deebee

customer_reviews.title: Read comment
customer_reviews.text: Several paints were so dried up I couldn't get them to mix with water, mixer medium or anything. Could not use air brush gun with this at all. Must paint with brush. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nyla

customer_reviews.title: GO BO! You'll be a hit and a pro!
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to other paints. The woman helping me, bought some junk at Walmart as always with their stuff. Their's didn't cover and was watery. She used mine and would by Bo Buggles next time.
customer_reviews.author: anthony newton

customer_reviews.title: Fun in a Box!
customer_reviews.text: Made me into a decent face paint artist. Stencils and good quality paints make all the difference. Such fun for parties, holidays and anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Great water based paints!
customer_reviews.text: These paints are great, easy to apply, and they dry off so you are not staining clothes and everything that touches you. The colors selection is great and the glitter addition is just the cherry on top. Only improvement would be to make glitter cream or gel instead of loose. Would make it easier to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Berrygirl

customer_reviews.title: My grand children love to paint their friends and family's faces
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. My grand children love to paint their friends and family's faces. Paint is very safe, it has never broken out their faces or given them rashes and comes off with warm water easily.
customer_reviews.author: j2p

product_meta.title: Bo Buggles Professional Face Paint Kit + 50 Stencils. Water-Activated XL Face Painting Palette. Loved by Pro Painters for Vibrant Detailed Designs. 12x10 Gram Paints, 4x10ml Glitters, 2 Brushes.
feature_bullets: Presenting Bo Buggles... the face paint endorsed by pro painters worldwide! Amazing professional quality, skin-safe, water-activated face paint set for kids and adults, all presented in a gorgeous gift box. You want bold and colorful? Check out the Rainbow Cheetah design in the product pictures!
Make 100s of designs with large 10g paint pots and 10ml glitter dust pots, with screw down lids to keep your paint fresh.
50 adhesive stencils that flex and follow the contours of the body and face for perfect application with no seeping. Each stencil will remain adhesive up to 3-4 uses.
2 quality brushes. Filbert brush for larger areas and liner brush for fine details (perfect for line work).
Easy to apply with just a drop or 2 of water added to a brush and mixed with the paints to activate into a creamy bold and vibrant paint. Remove using a washcloth with soap and water.
